Text: UGI Capacity Release Auction Total of DTHDay Cc Good Morning Enporion would like to invite you to participate in todays event representing offers for capacity release from UGI Please note there will two separate lots or auctions for minutes from PM ET For UGI you will be bidding on the following ID UGI Capacity Release Offer DTHDay November March Transco STA STA Zones ID UGI Capacity Release Offer DTHDay November March Transco STA STA Zones After the auctions close it is imperative that you please stay logged into the system for at least minutes The auction may open again because of extensions Should you need any assistance please feel free to reach us through our toll free telephone support line at PROCURE or or via email at nporioncom Thank you Enporion Auctions Team You can sign in and view the auctions right now by visiting Mary C Zampino MCSE CCA Auctions Administrator Enporion Dynamic Commerce The information contained in this communication may be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure It is intended solely for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed and others authorized to receive it If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately and then deletedestroy this document
